data.message: I heard it five minutes ago for the first time. THAT IS FIRE! It’s REAL. Anyone who is in a position where a lot of people look up to them are going to relate. (lower on the pole, not so much😏Anyone who had dreams but isn’t ready to quit. Beyoncé was amazing too💙

replies.message: Melinda Mienko   Yup. After I heard it, my whole outlook changed on my day. I had a “I don’t have to be everything for everybody all day today” attitude. Let myself be human, took the cape off. ❤️
